plot: It's hard to say what came first - the pain, the pounding, or the tiny growth on the back of Stan Leiber's head. But, certainly, Stan woke up one morning - forever changed.
title: The Metamorphosis
plot_es: It's hard to say what came first - the pain, the pounding, or the tiny growth on the back of Stan Leiber's head. But, certainly, Stan woke up one morning - forever changed.
plot_en: It's hard to say what came first - the pain, the pounding, or the tiny growth on the back of Stan Leiber's head. But, certainly, Stan woke up one morning - forever changed.
